resources.string: This screen can show list of music genres and images. We can create one custom adapter (contains image and textview) and use it across app where it is required. On list item click app opens new screen corresponding to that genre which has list of songs with the name of the singer and albom. User can click on song and open music playing screen. User can click on button and open list of music moods. In music playing screen app can have FAB for sharing song in social accounts. As well as user can save playing song in \'liked songs\'.

This screen can show list of music moods and corresponding images. We can have the same structure here as in genres activity. User can navigate up from action bar. User can click on button and go to new released songs screen.

This screen can show list of artist names. We can use created custom adapter for image and textview for artist\'s name and image. User can select one artist from list and open screen with the list of songs of this artist. and on song click app opens music playing screen. User can click on button and go to new released songs screen.

This screen can show list of popular songs with albom\'s image. On list item click app can open details screen and button for buying albom (on button click app can use implicit intent in order to open albom buying screen for paypal). User can click on button and go to artists screen.
This screen can show list of new released songs with the name of artist and image of the albom. User can select song and go to song playing screen. User can click on button and go to genres screen.
